评分分布分析.关键洞察: 产品评价呈现明显的两极分化，360度拍摄功能、8K画质和易用性带来了大量5星好评，但产品可靠性问题、软件兼容性和客户服务质量导致了大量1星差评。

示例评论: The 360 imaging is stunningly clear, crisp, precise, and mind boggling. I LOVE that it takes out the selfie stick somehow
I love how it captures absolutely everything, no worrying about missing shots
The ability to capture from all angles is amazing, the video quality is astounding for what it is
The 8K footage is super crisp, and the 360° view makes everything feel so immersive
8K looks insane. Took it out for some rail stuff and the tracking actually followed for once
The 8K video quality is off the charts
This camera is ridiculously easy to use. Just lock the angle on your bike then shoot
It is so easy to use. It comes on quickly. It records quickly
Very easy to use and it has a lot of features
The stabilization is insane. No matter what you do, it will always look stable
Even bombing down rocky trails, the footage stayed increibly smooth
The built-in stabilization and wind guard make it perfect for action shots
The 8K resolution paired with the bigger sensors delivers exceptionally clean footage
Captures stunning 8K footage with smooth stabilization, even in low light
360 camera was interesting, we'll have to play with it more
The Insta360 X5 delivers exceptional 8K 360° video with impressive low-light performance
However, the companion app could benefit from further refinement
The device relies on your cell phone way too much for my tastes
Camera heats up when editing and using
Great camera. Awesome editing features and technology. Camera heats up when editing and using
Fun camera but horrible app! If they don't fix the Insta360 app soon. I will return it!!!
Does get too hot and turns off for excessive heat it not fair to pay so much money for that cámara
Microphone on this is better than the X4 but the image quality is the same, not worth the extra $100
The only issue is that it's too hot to stop recording automatically after one hour
Functionally the camera is a piece of junk
The camera overheats. At room temperature, 8K with a connected power bank overheats after 22.5 minutes
This was my first live action 360 camera, and I enjoyed this camera a lot while I noticed the body of camera is heated when it is on
Dont know what anyones talking about, app needed an update, and it updated. Works just fine. Only downside is face tracking doesnt work with anything above 30 FPS
My main frustration stems from its abysmal low-light performance, particularly with 8K files
Camera stopped working 1 day into vacation in Mexico. Camera only went 12" under water with all access ports fully closed!
This is great if you like to buy a new one every year, that's about how long it lasts before it starts glitching and then quits all together
Water got inside camera on 2nd day of trip to Greece after putting it underwater for 5seconds
I hate this product I hate your lack of customer help, you have lied to me a half dozen times making promises that you haven't kept
Insta360 is the worst company I've ever worked with from a support perspective in my entire life
Their customer service is lacking, and they do not take responsibility for their mistakes
The camera won't let you do anything without connecting it to the app for no reason. The app will not let me update to 2.0
Great camera, awful apps. The desktop software is basically useless—it crashes or throws errors when trying to load a simple 3-minute video
Camera has cool features it's too bad the app is so terrible that it makes editing almost imposible
